mapper.insert: insert into st_user_peas_his( user_id, peas_type, peas_balance, register_number, gift_id, if_exchange, area_id, accept_person, accept_date ) values ( #{userId}, #{peasType}, #{peasBalance}, #{registerNumber}, #{giftId}, #{ifExchange}, #{areaId}, #{acceptPerson}, now() )
mapper.select: select peas_id as peasId, area_id as areaId, user_id as userId, peas_type as peasType, peas_balance as peasBalance, register_number as registerNumber, gift_id as giftId, if_exchange as ifExchange, accept_person as acceptPerson, accept_date as acceptDate from st_user_peas_his where user_id =#{userId}
